text: Decide which of the following statements is correct. (O Patient’s 1's plasma T4 concentration changes are likely to be attributed to areduced activation of TSH receptors. © Patient’s 2's plasma T4 concentration changes are likely to reflect the presence of a TSH secreting tumour in the pituitary gland. (O Patient's 2is likely to benefit from the administration of eltroxine (thyroid hormone). (O Patient's 1 islikely to benefit from the administration of TSH. The plasma concentration of thyrotropin-releasing hormone (TRH) is most likely to be increased in @ patient 1. O patient 2.
